titleInfo.title: Burn. Mrs. George Fort Milton telegram in support of ratification.

mods.abstract: Mrs. George Fort Milton, Nashville, Tenn., telegram to Mrs. J.L. Burn, Niota, Tenn., in support of ratification. August 18, 1920. Handwritten. 'The Tennessee League of Women Voters congratulates you upon the noble stand of your son in voting to enfranchise American and Tennessee women. We invite you to come immediately to Nashville as our guest to see the ratification completed. Come to Hermitage Hotel. Wire reply collect. Mrs. Geo Fort Milton, Chairman.'
